"Jet Boots":
"Jet Boots are weapons that fight by combining melee attacks with Techniques. While using Jet Boots, you can perform a mid-air double jump.

<%WeaponActionText>: Evade on the spot."

"Jet Boots perform acrobatic attacks based around kicks.

<%WeaponActionText> after a normal attack: Unleash a flurry of kicks."
"When using Jet Boots, you can set Techniques on your Weapon Palette and incorporate them into your combo."

"Each Jet Boots Photon Art has a Shift Action, an alternate mode that often has some special extra effect such as casting Shifta or Deband.

<%WeaponActionText> during or after a PA: Perform that PA's Shift Action."
